title: How Long Would It Take A Salaried Person To Reach Musk Levels Of Wealth?

title: Newlywed In Brazil Strangled After Slapping Co-Worker Who Asked For A Kiss

title: YouTuber Buys "Ready-Made House" For $39,000. It Turned Into A Nightmare
content: From a place to buy books, Amazon has now evolved into a place you can buy anything from. Even a home, yes. But is it liveable and does it even make sense to buy one from the e-commerce giant?

title: On Camera, Biker Lands On Car Roof After High-Speed Collision
content: A motorcyclist flying onto the roof of a car after a high-speed collision on a freeway in Melbourne has been caught on camera.

title: Amazon Offers Free Computing Power To AI Researchers To Challenge Nvidia

title: Opinion: Just Like Rome, The American Empire Is Crumbling From Within

title: Sri Lanka Goes To Snap Polls Tomorrow: How New Parliament Is Elected
content: Sri Lanka President Anura Kumara Dissanayake dissolved parliament on September 24 to clear the way for the general election, days after the Marxist-leaning leader was elected president on a platform for change.

title: Trump Net Worth Dips $300 Million As Truth Social Parent's Stocks Stumble

title: "In This Day And Age...": S Jaishankar's Sharp Take On Russia Ties Question

title: Byju's US Units Wrongly Stripped Of Education App, Court Rules
content: Two money-making education apps that are part of the troubled Byju's software empire were wrongly transferred away from US lenders and must be returned to a court-supervised bankruptcy trustee, a federal judge ruled Tuesday.

title: In This Country, Cold War Relics Are Coming Back To Life. Here's How

title: Airlines Cancel Flights After Volcanic Eruptions. Why That's A Good Thing

title: 18th Century Sculpture Bought For Rs 540 Could Sell For Over Rs 2.68 Crore
